text: "Six Ribbons" is a 1978 song by Australian singers Jon English and Mario Millo. It was taken from the soundtrack Against the Wind. It went to number 5 in Australia, number 1 in Norway, number 3 in New Zealand and number 4 in Sweden. It was covered by The Ten Tenors in 2017. ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Jon English songs
title: Six Ribbons
